channel.title: Model help :)
channel.description: okay hello all :) well if i download a model and add it to my models list how will i get it in game? so basicaly how would i make it appear ingame and how would i acquire it thanks

item.title: Model help :)
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok this si client sided but i can help soo go to your client you are using and open the class8.java and add the inits such as this

if(i == ITEMNUMBER) \\ the item number you use to spawn items { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anInt174 = DROP MODEL AND INVENTORY LOOK;//item look class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = MALE WEAR MODEL; class8.anInt200 = FEMALE WEAR MODEL; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "ITEM NAME"; class8.aByteArray178 = "ITEM DISCRIPTION".getBytes(); }

just edit that to your item and put your items models in the models folder they have to be g zipped with 7zip and they have to be in .dat before you gzip them, soo there ya go if u need help add me on msn

Read full topic

Wrong section; Post in Graphics > Child Board: Models
